Package com.example.pigeon_party_app

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.pigeon_party_app.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to create events

      public Map<String,User> getUsersWaitlisted()
      Retrieves the list of users who are currently on the waitlist for the event.
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      status - The status of the user in the event list
      db - The firestore database
